arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Cardiff City: Mark Sykes impresses off bench for Robins in draw
arts.sum: It came after a difficult time for McNally appeared to lose confidence as Cardiff heaped the pressure on early in the second half. Like a a few other City men, they couldn’t match the level of Cardiff early in the second period and was part of the triple change.

arts.ttl: Omer Riza says he's overseen major Cardiff City improvement and has 'no regrets' over Bristol City decision
arts.sum: The Bluebirds were held to a 1-1 draw by Bristol City at Ashton Gate

arts.ttl: McNally salvages point for Bristol City in Severnside derby
arts.sum: Luke McNally headed his first Bristol City goal to earn a 1-1 Championship draw from a passionate Severnside derby with Cardiff at Ashton Gate.

arts.ttl: The Cardiff City player ratings at Bristol City as Ollie Tanner steals the show
arts.sum: Here is how the Bluebirds players rated at Ashton Gate following the 1-1 draw

Cardiff City: Alnwick, Ng, Goutas, Chambers, Bagan, Ralls (Rinomhota, 77'), Robertson (Siopis 84'), Colwill, Tanner (Kanga 77'), El Ghazi (Daland 66'), Robinson (O'Dowda 66'). Three changes gave the Robins a new lease of life, with Mark Sykes heading just wide of the upright, but chances on goal became limited for both sides.

arts.ttl: Luke McNally scores first Bristol City goal to salvage home draw against Cardiff
arts.sum: McNally’s 73rd-minute header cancelled out Ollie Tanner’s opener.

arts.ttl: Bristol City 1-1 Cardiff City: Bluebirds remain bottom after Tanner's derby-day stunner is cancelled out
arts.sum: Cardiff City were held to a 1-1 draw away to Bristol City

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Cardiff City: Options aplenty with injured duo back in fold
arts.sum: Ross McCrorie returned to the bench for the first time this term against Sheffield Wednesday following a hamstring issue picked up on the eve of the season, while George Earthy, who had missed three fixtures due to an ankle injury, has also been named in the 20-man squad for the previous two games. After a midweek goalless stalemate against Sheffield Wednesday on home soil, City will be looking to return to continue their three-game unbeaten run in the Championship.

arts.ttl: Bristol City v Cardiff City live: Kick-off time, TV channel and score updates
arts.sum: Cardiff City head to Ashton Gate for the Severnside derby

arts.ttl: ‘We’re fired up’ - Liam Manning’s Bristol City warning to Cardiff City ahead of Severnside derby - Bristol Live
arts.sum: And the Robins boss believes an exciting contest awaits with the form book ripped up for the “unique” game. And Manning has identified the tweaks the temporary Bluebirds boss has made having watched their midweek fixture against the Lions at the Cardiff City Stadium on Tuesday.
